author: rpluem
msg: * Use the query string stored in r->parsed_uri.query instead of r->args
as r->args could have been changed (e.g. via mod_rewrite) after the quick
handler hook. This causes resources to be stored under a key, where they
cannot be fetched again in the quick handler.

author: jonesde
msg: A few include enhancements so that everything in the other controller.xml file is included, though everything can be overriden
